text: Very good soundtrack by good ol' Koshiro. I'd advise listening to an alternate version of the soundtrack using a different Genesis sound chip that can be found on IzSwable's channel, gives the music a crisper sound that makes it even better. IzSwable's channel is a goldmine.
author: Shad G

text: Yuzo Koshiro bringing some of hisï»¿ sweet music. I remember liking this game a lot more back then, than whenï»¿ I played it again on the Wii VC. The music however, is timeless. This theme even reminds me a bit of the first Castlevania (0:25). I'm a fan of his contribution to Portrait of Ruin's soundtrack for the same reason: it really sounds inspired by the NES Castlevania games, different from Yamane's style.
